input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Eating citrus has a direct effect on vitmain C. Vitmain C has a direct effect on curly hair. The overall probability of citrus intake is 90%. The probability of absence of citrus and curly hair is 7%. The probability of citrus intake and curly hair is 30%. Is the chance of curly hair larger when observing citrus intake?
